de.fzi.replica.app.node
Interface Node

All Superinterfaces:
Application, Client, Server
public interface Node
extends Server, Client

A node is a peer which can connect to any other node and provides access to shared ontologies. Therefore a node has client as well as server functionalities.
For building a client/server communication structure use Client and Server. TODO: look into distributed ontology systems literature

Version:
0.1, 01.12.2010
Author:
Jan Novacek novacek@fzi.de
